website_summaries.verdict: The best budget billiards table cover that comes in a variety of colors for personalization.
pros: Vinyl outer surface is resistant to normal wear along with mild food or drink stains
Cover folds out easily to cover most 8-foot billiards tables without issue
cons: Creases from folding the cover may be noticeable while covering the table

customer_reviews.title: Great pool table cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great pool table cover for the price. Take my advice, and the advice I read on here. When you get this pool table cover. Stretch it over your table, then throw it in the drier for 10mins or so until its warm. Then stretch it back out on your table. All of the lines people were complaining about went away and it fits a lot better now.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! I bought this cover for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I bought this cover for my husband as a birthday gift. The cover is described as heavy duty in the description, and they are not kidding. It looks very nice and covers the corner pockets perfectly. It was not tight on the fitting at all (I have an eight foot Olhausen). The color is perfect and true to the pictures. I chose the burgundy color. The wrinkles will need time to flatten out. What I didn't like is how it took so longer to get to me (1 1/2 weeks), considering I live within an hour and a half drive from the Amazon facility.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover! We bought a cheap vinyl cover but my girlfriend hated it. Did some research and decided on this one. I am so happy we did. It is even nicer then I expected. Nice and heavy duty and it actually looks very good in person. Better then how it looks in pictures. It fits my older 8ft valley table perfect! We bought a "like new" one for like $10 less and of course there was nothing wrong with it. Some people complain about the fold creases not coming out. While this is true I don't find it to be an issue. If you are looking for a great quality pool table cover buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to cover a Sportcraft Crestwood 8ft by 53 1/2” billiard table. This isn’t some high priced slate table but is a great table for what it is and I needed something that was kid accident proof. Does this cover fit snug around the edges to keep determined tiny hands off the table? No. Does it offer protection from a kids direct hit from a baseball bat? No. Does it keep the table safe from respectful kids that sometimes has an oops moment? Yes and that’s why I think it’s an excellent cover that’s decent weight with web backing that is also waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: BAD SMELL!?! - FOLLOW UP a few days later
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT LOOKS LIKE A DECENT QUALITY, BUT THE SMELL IS A BIT TOXIC TO SAY THE LEAST. IT'S ONLY BEEN IN THE HOUSE A FEW HOURS AND I CAN'T HANDLE THE STRONG, STRONG AROMA. MAKES MY EYES WATER/BURN. FOLLOW UP! After this cover laid on the floor for a day the smell started to go away. The wrinkles are still pretty prominent, hopefully they go away with time. The color looks great in our room. My apologies for the first part of my review. It was so stinky and strong... but is getting better with time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heavy duty cover for our table
customer_reviews.text: This cover was perfect for our table and fit perfectly. At first, it seemed like it might be a bit small, but once fully unfolded and put on the table, it was a perfect fit. Per some other reviews, we opted for the black one to avoid issues some others reported about the smell from the other colors, and our black one had no smell. It also didn't have any persistent folds once it was put onto the table. The thick, heavy duty material was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent. Made of heavy durable material. However, you will need to "air" this product outside before placing on your pool table inside. It has a strong odor when packaging is first opened. The color amber is deceiving. It is really a dark brown with "Hints" of amber throughout. I was hoping for more amber but the brown comes closer to matching room decor than the green. It is true to size and fits our 8' table perfectly. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: music man

customer_reviews.title: Great looking fitted pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom. Her old pool table cover had started to disintegrate after years and years of use. This was a great replacement. It looks great and fits great too. The creases from being folded up are noticeable, but not bad and they don't bother me at all. It seems pretty heavy duty and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Hardhack

customer_reviews.title: A bit shorter than it should be.
customer_reviews.text: The material is wonderful. It even has a nice, soft lining. But the cover needs to be about 2 inches longer and wider. I'm hoping it will stretch as it ages but for now, it's extremely tight and doesn't fit as it should. I struggled to get it over the corners. It really doesn't look quite right but I'm trying to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Y. Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! It was exactly what my mom was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! It was exactly what my mom was looking for. She said the color is just a little darker then what's pictures and she did like that better. Also, just like everyone else, it was a bit longer then her pool table, but extra coverage... shes not complaining. It matched her bar room very well, and my mom is very hard to please so ordering this for her I was really worried. But glad it worked out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, thick, beautiful table cover! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures don't do this cover justice. I got the green color and it's a beautiful forest green without that weird, cheap marbling look. It's thick, heavy, and looks awesome on my table. Fits my 8ft table perfectly, with a little extra play. I bought mine in November 2017, and don't remember any kind of smell. But it did a long time for the folded creases to finally soften and go away. That doesn't matter to me though.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Durable Heavyweight 8' Cover
customer_reviews.text: It covers our table well enough, but would have liked is to be a little longer on the sides. Regardless, the material is smooth on the top and has a fabric type feeling on the bottom. It does its job of keeping the dust off very well. It is easy to remove and install. The material is durable and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Sue Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit was great. Installed cover for a few hrs then took it off and put in dryer for 10 minutes and immediately put it back on table.doing this removed all creases and wrinkles from being folded up during packing. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Green is good
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as described. Got the green one. Was a little too big for my table, but it'll do just fine. Folks complaining in the reviews about creases and new vinyl smell. I left it outside on my balcony railing for about 4 hours and brought it in with no issue as far as smell. The creases aren't deep and my sense is that they'll dissipate with time. Gave me a sense of relief to have my table covered. Overall quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: great cover for the price.
customer_reviews.text: read the reviews on this cover and I have to say I am pleased with the fit, finish and overall quality of this cover. fits my 8' table very well. I saw some users complain about the creases not coming out of it. personally if that's the only thing you have to complain about, consider yourself fortunate. this is a good quality cover for the price. cant ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: cforcht

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover for a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but I was not surprised. I read many of the reviews before I purchased this cover that said the quality was really good. I am actually using in on my 8 foot air hockey table and it fits very well. Some people had a problem with the squares after you unfold the cover. I actually like the fold squares. It make the cover look new. I guess I might be a little weird.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Thick, easy fit, looks great
customer_reviews.text: really like this cover. it has a very slight cherry tint to it, which matches our crimson & cherry decor. Heavy duty, but very easy to get on/off the eight foot table. It protects the table well from our ping pong table top that sits on it. It does come with the "fold wrinkles" visible. I may try to iron at some point.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great cover - too small per measurements
customer_reviews.text: I really want this to work, but it does not fit my table! I have an Olhausen that measures 60.6" x 111", from wood to wood, the felt is closer to 8 ft. The 8 foot cover does not extend enough to drape over the sides and with the drape spread out, does not cover the table. I'm writing this because the posted measurements without drape are too small. I thought the measurements with drape were the correct way to measure. Now, I'm not sure what size to get. I've sent this back but will definitely reorder once I figure this out.
customer_reviews.author: JuJu

customer_reviews.title: Possibly allow the item to “warm” up before spreading it out.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is okay. The fit and color are really good. The problem lies with the “pleather” material itself. The item was packaged in such a way and so tight that the “pleather” stuck together in a few places and when we opened it and spread it out, the “pleather” from one side stuck and pealed off to the other. Only in a couple of spots. Enough to be annoyed but not enough to make us return it.
customer_reviews.author: James Branton

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheap light plastic cover that the cats tore to shreds and wound up with a scratch in the cloth (though after some intense brushing, the scratch mostly came out.) I bought this based on the reviews and I agree -- I love it! Fits my 8' Olhausen table perfectly which measures 100" by 55" from the outside rail edges. Thick, heavy duty, quality -- I would recommend this unconditionally. And I don't mind the fold-lines though if I get ambitious I may try the dryer trick. Stan M.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: have no issues with it. its seems very durable and looks great. I set a ping pong table on top of my pool table occasionally and it still looks brand new! It fit my full sized pool table perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! I was skeptical as I always am when purchasing online. But I read the reviews over and over and people raved about it. And they were right! It fits like a glove. The material and quality is great! It’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyce Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit for my 8' Table
customer_reviews.text: My table originally came with a thin "shower curtain" like cover. I was ready to upgrade to something more sturdy but I wanted it snug. This fit my table perfectly and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Life 2018

customer_reviews.title: wrinkledl
customer_reviews.text: The folds have still no came out. I tried putting it in the dryer for 5 minutes and also ironed it with a pillow case on top. I don't believe they will ever flatten. Purchased in Dec 2014, Its now Aug 2016 and the folds are about like they were when I got it. Tried weighting it down for several days with heavy books, also ran it in the dryer. Its a very nice cover but you have to accept that the folds are permanent.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cook

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this pool table cover. It looks nice in brown, fits perfectly as described, easy to get on/ off, didn't have any obnoxious smell upon arrival. We don't play that often but hopefully it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Have to say if you value your table .then this is a cover I would highly recommend.fits great,the heavy duty fitted leathered protects the table and railing really great.love the thickness to it.very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The cover fit my 8 foot Olhausen pool table just fine. I didn’t have any of the reportrd issues with the cover sticking when unfolding it out of the package . It seems nice and heavy weight. Overall, I feel like I made the right selection and it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Burgundy
customer_reviews.text: The color "burgundy" can mean just about anything, from bright, red to a deep purplish color. The burgundy we got was a perfect, subdued, neutral brownish color and blended well with all the other wood in the room. Very pleased with that. The cover fit our 8' 2" pool table just fine with a bit of room to spare. The material is not super thick, padded or retro-looking. But it is thick enough to be quality. For the price, it looks reasonably nice, is well made and does the job we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Good solid cover.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for my Brunswick closed pocket table. It has a little extra slack so not too tight of a fit. Fabric underneath but doesnt seem to shed. Thickness is pretty good if you have pets. Price not bad compared to real leather options.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove! NO LINT!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my 8 foot Brunswick Contender. Like other reviewers, I put it in the dryer for 10 minutes to get some of the fold marks out. I expect the rest to settle out naturally. And, unlike the cover I was replacing, there is no flannel backing like a tablecloth's, so no lint!! Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits well and is heavy duty enough that I dont need to worry about my cat jumping on the table. it also looks good and the wrinkles are slowly working their way out
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a heavier-duty pool table cover. We mainly use the pool table as an extra large table but want to keep it protected, and this was absolutely perfect! For a little more $$, this one will last forever...
customer_reviews.author: K. Nonies

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect on our 8 Foot table. This is the second cover I've bought. We had a smaller table and was happy with the 7 ft cover as well. I figured why not go with what works, and it does!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Heavy material, looks great
customer_reviews.text: The material is heavy duty, looks to be very difficult to rip or puncture. It does fit the pool table, but very tight. It could use an extra inch or two in the corners to better fit. Overall, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Devil Dave & Allie

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, but air it out first.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is heavy duty and drapes well over my Brunswick table. Had to leave it outside for 48 hours to eliminate a very, very strong plastic chemical/solvent type odor. Surprisingly the smell disappeared completely. The wine color is closet to brown but no big deal. Glad I purchased and feel better about protecting the table.
customer_reviews.author: Toofer2

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy cover
customer_reviews.text: a great cover, especially for the price. Holds up well through cats scratching it and many foldings. The color is beautiful, too. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: M. Vance

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, good quality and weight. Just a tad too big for my 7ft table, but not sloppy at all. Great price for my man cave/ garage pool table!
customer_reviews.author: Liquidonyx

customer_reviews.title: wonderful cover
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews and seeing a few that complained about it not fitting correctly I was a bit hesitant. But I took the risk and am so glad I did/ This cover fits perfectly, I laid it in the yard for about an hour to remove the smell and fold lines and it came back in perfect. It is exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: CPutnamVa

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: A bit large for my table but it is a quality vinyl cover and soft inner lining. My table is on the pool deck and covered by roof overhead but screened on the sides. I should say it’s not a slate table and a non conventional size so I’m sure it will fit a standard table perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Roth

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: It fits my 8 foot Olhausen pool table perfectly, it is made well and the material is heavy duty. Seems like it will last a long time. I have had this cover for about 5 months now, and the creases in the material from being folded up don't smooth out on their own, but they don't bother me at all. I think that if they bother you, you could try to steam them out or take a medium hot iron and iron the cover's underside and put a towel or some kind of fabric in between the cover and the iron to protect the vinyl from melting. I definitely recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover for pool table. I am surprise I liked that much. Much better that the cheap plastic cover I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Classy sharp look,  Excellent Quality, Fits Great!
customer_reviews.text: This table covering fits great, has a nice quality to it, and looks sharp. It's just a tad bit larger than my 8' table, so it's easy to put on and take off. We are extremely happy with it, and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TPIL

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks good, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is exactly as advertised; it is a heavy duty pool table cover. The overhang over the edges of the table is about 9". The fold lines have not gone away after a couple of months, but the creases really don't bother me; they are parallel, symmetrical and like I said, it doesn't bother. Previously I was using the freebie cheapie plastic over the table and this is a quantum leap over that. Oh, the smell dissipated after a day or two. Even my wife can't smell it. Good value purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N

customer_reviews.title: Pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: We love this cover for our pool table! It is heavy duty, good looking and holds up well! Our 3 cats are up on it daily and no problems! I just wipe it off and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Angela G Moran

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cover for the pool table when we put the ping pong table over the pool table. Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BerchT

customer_reviews.title: Protects and fits well
customer_reviews.text: This fits well, is much thicker than the previous cover and protects the pool table. Yes, it has fold marks that haven't really relaxed much. But who cares. The pool table isnt on the main floor and the cover is seldom seen. It does what we wanted it to do; covers and protects the table.
customer_reviews.author: Fundmntl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cover
customer_reviews.text: We had a cheap cover of nonsupported vinyl that our cats did not consider. Thus, several tears and slashes were inevitable. The new cover ordered arrived quickly and fits perfectly on our 8 foot table. It has a tailored drape and the burgundy color matches our cherry woods of the table and accessories. The quality of stitching and the supported backing of the vinyl are superb. Very pleased with the product. Also, the cats seem intimidated and they stay off.
customer_reviews.author: Norman H. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: This is nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and heavy. I had one of the thin overs for my pool table but the cats would rip it up with their claws. That does not happen with this one. I got this just in time. Had a leak in the room above the pool table. Water dripped onto the pool table and filled this cover up. If I had the thin cover I think my pool table would have been ruined. This kept my pool table dry and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Cover, Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good heavy pool table cover. It has a white backing that has not shed so far. It fit my 8' Olhausen table perfectly. I like the green marble color.
customer_reviews.author: Roger White

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality product for the money. Fit is off by just a smidge, but I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Marc of Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, looks durable, fits perfectly over the 8-foot pool table. The pool table at the senior citizens center needed something to protect it from kids who are there during fundraisers and family events and from accidental spills when we rent the place out. The cover has proven to be the perfect solution. It looks good, too.
customer_reviews.author: 1936ish

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and fits an 8 foot Golden West table perfectly. There was a faint plastic smell when first unwrapped but that went away after a day. Next up is attempted ironing to smooth things out as even after a few weeks the folds are still there. Overall, a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PB Erik

customer_reviews.title: Cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty cover. I have a Peter Vitalie table and the cover fits correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Super nice cover at amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a REALLY nice cover for our table for ages, but just couldn't bring myself to fork over $80 or more to get one. I thought this one looked nice and the price was great so I thought I'd take a chance. It came very quickly and I was just blown away. It's not just nice, it's VERY nice. It's made of heavy vinyl fabric, so I believe it will be very durable. It is tailored -sort of like a bed skirt so that it fits very well. I'm just thrilled with this purchase. Love the color (dark green).
customer_reviews.author: Julimck

customer_reviews.title: Using on 7' bar table
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find anything made for a 7 foot bar table - but this one does cover very nice. Waiting for the crinkles from shipping to flatten out.
customer_reviews.author: hdude

customer_reviews.title: It’s makeup
customer_reviews.text: Those about getting this for my husband from years. Finally did. Boy was he thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: No morr cat hair on table
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Keeps cat from getting under it. That was the whole reason I got it. When the cat does get up on the table you can just wipe the hair off. Cat can no longer put a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Not quite 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Fit was a little loose and the creases where it was folded have yet to flatten out. Color is good.
customer_reviews.author: KCat

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This works good on my 9" pool table. Decent quality, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover
customer_reviews.text: Got this because we knew the cats would try to jump on the new pool table. Very thick and sturdy, easy to take off and on. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy,  and it looks awesome on my pool table
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy, and it looks awesome on my pool table
customer_reviews.author: HAZEL HANDMADE SOAP

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great quality...!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This awesome cover fit our billiard table perfectly....did no expect this cover to be this nice... it is even fitted...!!! It is always nice to be so unexpectedly pleased...!!!
customer_reviews.author: WandaLovesMakeup

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ten times better than the one supplied with the table.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a year ago and the quality is great and looks as good as the day I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sturdy pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Color and shade look very good. Fit table well. Excellent condition on arrival. Very study cover.
customer_reviews.author: Abuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift from my wife and fit great and save my table from all the stuff sat on it. Added class to the man cave
customer_reviews.author: DN13

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is heavy duty vinyl and way better than the ones sold in stores. I checked sears, walmart, modells, sports authority and dicks sporting goods. None had a cover this thick, I wanted something more economical but you have to pay for quality and coughed up the $$$. Really worth it, would recommend to protect your pool table and looks even better since colors available matched my table.
customer_reviews.author: Datboul

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Size
customer_reviews.text: My Olhausen Monarch table is 98" x 54" and this cover isn't even close to fitting. The corners don't fit like trying to fit a full sized fitted bedsheet onto a queen bed. I really wish that it would have worked out, as it is a well constructed cover. It is just not properly labeled or sized.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Mader

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is precisely what we needed. Prevents the cats from damaging the table. Keeps dust and hair to minimum. Great but for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Dunigan

customer_reviews.title: Blurry Picture Made It Hard To Know What You Were Getting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover for an outdoor pool table so it was important for me to know what the seams were like for keeping rain off the table, etc. The pictures accompanying the post were blurry so when I zoomed in it was impossible to really know what I was getting, however, all the reviews were positive so I went for it. Upon receipt I discovered there are two slits on both ends of the cover to allow it to stretch to fit on most pool tables. For an indoor table no problem, for an outdoor table more of the side will be exposed to the elements. I'll see how it fairs this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Marcee K Botelho

customer_reviews.title: One great pool table cover!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent pool table cover! Very satisfied with this product, well worth the money. Heavy and well fitting ( I have an 8 foot table.) If you need a good pool table cover, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Ray C.

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product! My old cover was shabby to the point where it made the room look bad. Quite the opposite with this cover. I am quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS ODAY

customer_reviews.title: No cat claw marks on this one
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for length and width. The apron around the sides could be a couple of inches longer, but it is starting to relax down. The main thing it is sturdy enough the cats no longer leave claw marks when they jump up on the table. The color is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove on my 8-foot Brunswick Table.
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove on my 8-foot Brunswick Table. The material is thick and the seams look well made. Like others have said--- there are creases from where it was folded for shipping. I am sure that would happen to any heavy material that was folded for shipping. For the price--- it is an extra layer of protection for the table when the kids are down stairs playing games.
customer_reviews.author: Gary DZ

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit an 8 foot table
customer_reviews.text: Tried to stretch this on my table and it immediately ripped. Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hull

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cover with some good padding, not just cheap vinyl. Good product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have an 8-foot table
customer_reviews.text: It cracks me up the negative reviews people are saying that it doesn't fit my table well maybe you should know what kind of table you have cuz I don't think you're going to buy 4 x 4 tires for a Toyota Camry. It is exactly as described it fits great and very good material overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: dorothy maestas

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if it was slightly longer but otherwise its a ...
customer_reviews.text: Covered my pool table except its a bit short. Would be great if it was slightly longer but otherwise its a great product
customer_reviews.author: Peter You

customer_reviews.title: I love it! GREAT quality for such a low price
customer_reviews.text: I love it! GREAT quality for such a low price...I WAS TRULY SURPRISED. It is a little big on my table, but overall I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect, thick/heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This cover is definitely heavy duty material. It fits my antique brunswick 8ft table perfectly. I would give it a fifth star if it was better looking/better color options. But for the price this is a great cover. Hopefully will stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Deliverance

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit - just classy pool cover
customer_reviews.text: nice weight perfect fit. Elevates the look of the pool table compared to my cheap black cover which was tearing. Another reviewer suggested to leave it outside to air because it has a chemical smell when first opened,
customer_reviews.author: LizG

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: Fit my pool table well. Good color and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: bo

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks very nice. It looks like a much more expensive cover and seems very sturdy. It does fit quite snug on our 8 ft table and it doesn't come down fully down the sides. It comes over the sides enough to hook it on and cover the top well, just don't expect it to come all the way down the sides. The burgundy color was a nice reddish brown.
customer_reviews.author: NoVAKim

customer_reviews.title: Need to measure exactly.
customer_reviews.text: My table measures 57x101 edge to edge. It is 1" larger than the edge to edge description of the cover. It does fit, barely. Measure the table before you buy and if the measurement of your table is larger, buy the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: FTWJIM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Billiiard Cover
customer_reviews.text: I like the thickness and protection it gives my table. I would of given it 5 stars but it’s too big for my 8ft table. Maybe they should do an option for table sizes....
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Good product but a bit small
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great but the fit was a bit too tight for my 8 foot table. If you have 6" side rails I would recommend you buy the 9 foot size
customer_reviews.author: K. Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Fits our outside pool table perfect! And is holding up to this San Diego ☀️
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Moyle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible marksmanship
customer_reviews.text: The fake leather started ripping as soon as i was unpacking it from the box. The whole think was folded and almost glued together that when you try to open it up, it started tearing the material. See photo. Dont buy!
customer_reviews.author: shahrooz zandnia

customer_reviews.title: Too short, nice material.
customer_reviews.text: Material is strong but not heavy, but I was expecting a longer cover. Sometimes it blows with the wind. Too short for my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and weight of material
customer_reviews.text: Very nice weight. Does have fold marks... but they will eventually go away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great cover!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the burgundy cover. It is beautiful!! Fits perfectly! Protects our table from the cats and spilt drinks! We would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Flint

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice, heavy-duty cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, heavy-duty cover. Fits reg 8' table, provides protection from dust. Appears water resistant but I'd clean up spills quickly. Looks nice, too
customer_reviews.author: grandma7

customer_reviews.title: GREAT cover!
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 8 ft. table perfectly! AND it looks beautiful! No complaints here - super especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this, way heavier than I thought it would be, wipes off easily and does not shed the inner liner on the table felt , cloth
customer_reviews.author: E. Willy

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and appears to be durable.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, but a lot of creases to contend with.
customer_reviews.author: Donp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but I ordered the wrong size and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, but I ordered the wrong size and had to return it (apparently pool tables come in a variety of sizes, oops). Ordered the exact same in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: maineiak07

customer_reviews.title: Good cover.
customer_reviews.text: Great cover at a great price. Takes a while for creases to come out but still a good cover. Pool table is used more for folding laundry than played on. So the cover is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pool Table Cover
customer_reviews.text: Best that money could buy. Heavy duty cover, yet very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: J. Skaritka

customer_reviews.title: ... it and placed on my 8ft table - fits nicely, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Just unpackaged it and placed on my 8ft table - fits nicely, looks good. Hopefully it doesn't rip like my other covers did. We shall see. So far so good, I think its worth the $40.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and fit perfectly on my 8 foot table.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

product_meta.title: Iszy Billiards 8 Foot Heavy Duty Fitted Leatherette Pool Table Billiard Cover Several Colors to Choose From
product_meta.description: Amber color - Total measurements are 115.5 " L X 71 " wide - Measurements without drape is 100" L X 56" W - Fits most 8 foot tables - Made of heavy duty vinyl
feature_bullets: 8 foot heavy duty pool table cover - Black color
Total measurements are 115.5 " L X 71 " wide
Measurements without drape is 100" L X 56" W - Fits most 8 foot table
Cotton backing - Made of heavy duty vinyl
